basics.name: Sydney Kim
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science (Data Science track) in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2024.

skills.name: Photo Editing and Graphic Design Tools

education.area: Computer Science Data Science Track (expected graduation Spring 2024)

highlights: Modernized the Customer Experience internal SharePoint website by developing and implementing custom features and reorganizing website structure to create a better user experience for both new and experienced users
Categorized customer feedback data to identify opportunities for improving the bankâ€™s services
Created personas used for understanding the wants, needs, and goals of different customers and employees based on their life cycle stage.
Attended and assisted at workshops implementing the Design Thinking process to generate ideas on internal improvements for workplace issues.
Build one-on-one relationships and assist incoming freshmen with their transition to university life
Teach a class introducing students to skills and resources for success in university life and beyond, including campus resources, time management, budgeting, and study skills
Create graphics and advertisements for program events to be printed as flyers, posted on social media, and distributed digitally.
Managing and updating Wordpress website reflecting program information, mentor pictures and biographies, and embedded links to registration.
Utilized computer-aided design and 3D printing to design and construct a case for particle counters in the CFHT dome
Participated in a design review and incorporated feedback to improve design
Delivered a final presentation to a technical audience with various fields of experience.
Shadowed engineers to learn about telescope instrumentation, summit operations, and remote observations
Create graphics for events including flyers, social media posts, and Discord banners
Coordinate posts on official club social media platforms such as Instagram, Twitter, Discord, Facebook, and Twitch
Plan club events and work with fellow officers to improve the safe gaming environment created by the club
Communicate with sponsors and third-parties to plan collaborative events

awards.title: UH Manoa Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Part of the New Warrior Scholarship awards. Awards incoming freshmen who are Hawaii residents attending UH Manoa with a scholarship of $10,000/year for 4 years.
